summary: SummaryL'Or√©al Telescopic Original Waterproof Mascara enhances your lashes with legendary length and ultimate definition.
details: DetailsBenefitsLengthening mascara for up to 60% longer lashesFragrance-freeOphthalmologist-tested & allergy-testedSuitable for sensitive eyes & contact lens wearersFeaturesSmooth formula applies easily & smoothlyFlexible Precision elastomer brush visibly lengthens lashes up to 60%The comb side of the brush precisely separates lashes for a clump-free resultItem 2545940How To UsePlace the brush at the base of lashes and gently sweep up to tip. Removes with waterproof makeup remover.Precautions: Flammable until dry. Do not use near fire, flame or heat. Treat the applicator with the hygienic care you give your eyes. Never apply this product in a moving vehicle. Do not dilute mascara with water, saliva, or any other substance. Cap tightly after use. If change in odor or appearance occurs, discontinue use. Do not use this or any other eye cosmetic if your eye is injured, irritated, or infected. Consult a physician promptly.IngredientsIsododecane, Cera Alba / Beeswax / Cire Dabeille, Copernicia Cerifera Cera / Carnauba Wax / Cire De Carnauba, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Aqua / Water / Eau, Alcohol Denat., Allyl Stearate/Va Copolymer, Oryza Sativa Cera / Rice Bran Wax, Paraffin, Polyvinyl Laurate, VP/Eicosene Copolymer, Propylene Carbonate, Talc, Synthetic Beeswax, Ethylenediamine/Stearyl Dimer Dilinoleate Copolymer, PEG-30 Glyceryl Stearate, Candelilla Cera / Candelilla Wax / Cire De Candelilla, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, BHT. May Contain: CI 77499 / Iron Oxides.
how_to_use: Place the brush at the base of lashes and gently sweep up to tip. Removes with waterproof makeup remover.Precautions: Flammable until dry. Do not use near fire, flame or heat. Treat the applicator with the hygienic care you give your eyes. Never apply this product in a moving vehicle. Do not dilute mascara with water, saliva, or any other substance. Cap tightly after use. If change in odor or appearance occurs, discontinue use. Do not use this or any other eye cosmetic if your eye is injured, irritated, or infected. Consult a physician promptly.
ingredients: Copernicia Cerifera Cera / Carnauba Wax / Cire De Carnauba
Oryza Sativa Cera / Rice Bran Wax
Candelilla Cera / Candelilla Wax / Cire De Candelilla

reviews.headline: YES YES YESS
reviews.comments: I love this waterproof mascara! My lashes don't like to stay curled, but with this mascara they stay curled AND it gives my lashes length! The only thing is that it is a bit of a struggle to remove but other than that, I love ittt:)

reviews.headline: YES YES YESS
reviews.comments:
I love this telescopic WATERPROOF mascara! My lashes have a hard time staying curled so with this mascara, it helps my lashes stay curled PLUS it gives my lashes length! 
The only thing is that it is a bit of a struggle to remove.

reviews.headline: The Hype Was Wrong
reviews.comments: The wand is awful, it flexes as you try to apply the mascara. I poked my eye twice bc of the wand flexing then popping bavk as I tried to apply. The formula clumped up on my lashes. Waste of money!

reviews.comments: I struggle to find mascaras that won't weigh down my eyelashes after curling them. This mascara helps keep the eyelashes up and curly.

reviews.headline: Smears
reviews.comments: If you put on any serums it seems to smear around my under eyes and the top of my lid. Not truly waterproof.

It gave me no length and taking it off my lashes was near impossible! And don't get me started on the applicator‚Ä¶.

faceoff_positive.comments: This mascara is hands down one of my favorite mascaras!!! I use the waterproof one and it holds my curl so well after I curl my lashes! In fact, it is one of the waterproof mascaras that holds my curl the best and longest! It is also very long lasting, it does not flake or smudge even after a long work day. It lengthens and separates my eyelashes and makes them look so long and pretty without clumping! It provides mostly length and not so much volume, but I still love the way it makes my eyelashes look! The brush is thin and clean making it easy to apply and without making a mess on my eyelid. The brush is flexible but despite what the other reviews say, it is easy to use and put back in the tube, I don't know why people struggle with the brush?? And if you have a hard time removing this mascara or any waterproof mascara... I recommend removing it with the blue Garnier micellar water or the Neutrogena oil-free makeup remover soaked on a cotton pad or even an oil based cleanser or balm. Overall a great great mascara!!! :)
faceoff_positive.headline: AWESOME MASCARA!!! :D

faceoff_negative.comments:
Before I even begin, I want you all to know that I'm a DIRHARD L'oreal Waterproof Mascara fan! I've used their waterproof formulas for years and never had issues. This product though was a total nightmare! 
I got this on sale with another L'oreal WP mascara. I figured I would see what was new when the price was right. I wish I didn't. 
The wand on this product is literally awful! It is a straight stick with wide spaced combs. There is no taper at all! The combs grab clumps of lashes at a time and coats them with a very wet product. I had to use a dummy wand to seperate them out do it didn't look like I had spider legs coming out of my eyes. This product provides 0 length and -0 curl. Even after only 1 coat, my lashes felt very heavy. The product also splatters when your trying to apply it, so I had to clean little black dots off my face for 10 minutes. 
I applied 1 coat, separated my lashes, and waited about 2 minutes like I always do before going back in with another coat. After 2 minutes, my lashes were rock solid. I pretty much gave up on a 2nd coat because my lashes were just too crunchy. I looked like garbage, but was too late to change anything. 
I wore this for about 13 hours before removing it with pure coconut oil like I always do. I had to let the oil sit for an extra few minutes before it all came off. I never reapplied mascara the next day because I was doing yard work all day and didn't need it. 
After my shower the night after I used this, I looked in the mirror horrified! There is a chunk of bottom lashes which are broken at around 1mm in length! I have blonde lashes and can't afford to loose a single one, so this is VERY bad! I did absolutely nothing different, and I'm used to waterproof formulas, but this is just total garbage! 
Ultimately, I returned it and now I'm warning anyone reading this review! DON'T BUY THIS! 
I wouldn't recommend this to an enemy let alone a friend. I'll go back to my usual L'oreal waterproof when my lashes grow back!
faceoff_negative.headline: I lost an entire cluster of bottom lashes!
